source.5cc2b3c6:
When we participate in a kaggle competition we follow some steps - 
                                             
                    1. Importing important libraries 
                    2. Visualizing the given train and test datasets
                    3. Preprocessing
                    4. EDA (Exploratory Data Analysis)
                    5. Feature engineering
                    6. Model Selection and Model Evaluation
                    7. Producing Output file
source.daf10f8a: As the task in here is simple that we only have to analyze the train data and and produce output from the test file we do not need any preprocessing,EDA or feature engineering in here.Those can be done still if someone wants to gain more accuracy. We are just going to understand how to participate.
